00069 CCC::~CCC()
00070 {

00074 void CCC::setACKTimer(const int& msINT)
00075 {
00076    m_iACKPeriod = msINT;
00077 
00078    if (m_iACKPeriod > m_iSYNInterval)
00079       m_iACKPeriod = m_iSYNInterval;
00080 }

00082 void CCC::setACKInterval(const int& pktINT)
00083 {
00084    m_iACKInterval = pktINT;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CCC::setRTO(const int& usRTO)
00088 {
00089    m_bUserDefinedRTO = true;
00090    m_iRTO = usRTO;
00091 }

00093 void CCC::sendCustomMsg(CPacket& pkt) const
00094 {
00095    CUDT* u = CUDT::getUDTHandle(m_UDT);
00096 
00097    if (NULL != u)
00098    {
00099       pkt.m_iID = u->m_PeerID;
00100       u->m_pSndQueue->sendto(u->m_pPeerAddr, pkt);
00101    }
00102 }
00103 
00104 const CPerfMon* CCC::getPerfInfo()
00105 {
00106    CUDT* u = CUDT::getUDTHandle(m_UDT);
00107    if (NULL != u)
00108       u->sample(&m_PerfInfo, false);
00109 
00110    return &m_PerfInfo;
00111 }

00143 void CCC::setUserParam(const char* param, const int& size)
00144 {
00145    delete [] m_pcParam;
00146    m_pcParam = new char[size];
00147    memcpy(m_pcParam, param, size);
00148    m_iPSize = size;
00149 }

00167 void CUDTCC::init()
00168 {
00169    m_iRCInterval = m_iSYNInterval;
00170    m_LastRCTime = CTimer::getTime();
00171    setACKTimer(m_iRCInterval);
00172 
00173    m_bSlowStart = true;
00174    m_iLastAck = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00175    m_bLoss = false;
00176    m_iLastDecSeq = CSeqNo::decseq(m_iLastAck);
00177    m_dLastDecPeriod = 1;
00178    m_iAvgNAKNum = 0;
00179    m_iNAKCount = 0;
00180    m_iDecRandom = 1;
00181 
00182    m_dCWndSize = 16;
00183    m_dPktSndPeriod = 1;
00184 }
00185 
00186 void CUDTCC::onACK(const int32_t& ack)
00187 {
00188    uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
00189    if (currtime - m_LastRCTime < (uint64_t)m_iRCInterval)
00190       return;
00191 
00192    m_LastRCTime = currtime;
00193 
00194    if (m_bSlowStart)
00195    {
00196       m_dCWndSize += CSeqNo::seqlen(m_iLastAck, ack);
00197       m_iLastAck = ack;
00198 
00199       if (m_dCWndSize > m_dMaxCWndSize)
00200       {
00201          m_bSlowStart = false;
00202          if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00203             m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00204          else
00205             m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00206       }
00207    }
00208    else
00209       m_dCWndSize = m_iRcvRate / 1000000.0 * (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval) + 16;
00210 
00211    // During Slow Start, no rate increase
00212    if (m_bSlowStart)
00213       return;
00214 
00215    if (m_bLoss)
00216    {
00217       m_bLoss = false;
00218       return;
00219    }
00220 
00221    int64_t B = (int64_t)(m_iBandwidth - 1000000.0 / m_dPktSndPeriod);
00222    if ((m_dPktSndPeriod > m_dLastDecPeriod) && ((m_iBandwidth / 9) < B))
00223       B = m_iBandwidth / 9;
00224 
00225    double inc;
00226 
00227    if (B <= 0)
00228       inc = 1.0 / m_iMSS;
00229    else
00230    {
00231       // inc = max(10 ^ ceil(log10( B * MSS * 8 ) * Beta / MSS, 1/MSS)
00232       // Beta = 1.5 * 10^(-6)
00233 
00234       inc = pow(10.0, ceil(log10(B * m_iMSS * 8.0))) * 0.0000015 / m_iMSS;
00235 
00236       if (inc < 1.0/m_iMSS)
00237          inc = 1.0/m_iMSS;
00238    }
00239 
00240    m_dPktSndPeriod = (m_dPktSndPeriod * m_iRCInterval) / (m_dPktSndPeriod * inc + m_iRCInterval);
00241 
00242    //set maximum transfer rate
00243    if ((NULL != m_pcParam) && (m_iPSize == 8))
00244    {
00245       int64_t maxSR = *(int64_t*)m_pcParam;
00246       if (maxSR <= 0)
00247          return;
00248 
00249       double minSP = 1000000.0 / (double(maxSR) / m_iMSS);
00250       if (m_dPktSndPeriod < minSP)
00251          m_dPktSndPeriod = minSP;
00252    }
00253 }
00254 
00255 void CUDTCC::onLoss(const int32_t* losslist, const int&)
00256 {
00257    //Slow Start stopped, if it hasn't yet
00258    if (m_bSlowStart)
00259    {
00260       m_bSlowStart = false;
00261       if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00262          m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00263       else
00264          m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00265    }
00266 
00267    m_bLoss = true;
00268 
00269    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[0] & 0x7FFFFFFF, m_iLastDecSeq) > 0)
00270    {
00271       m_dLastDecPeriod = m_dPktSndPeriod;
00272       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 1.125);
00273 
00274       m_iAvgNAKNum = (int)ceil(m_iAvgNAKNum * 0.875 + m_iNAKCount * 0.125);
00275       m_iNAKCount = 1;
00276       m_iDecCount = 1;
00277 
00278       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00279 
00280       // remove global synchronization using randomization
00281       srand(m_iLastDecSeq);
00282       m_iDecRandom = (int)ceil(m_iAvgNAKNum * (double(rand()) / RAND_MAX));
00283       if (m_iDecRandom < 1)
00284          m_iDecRandom = 1;
00285    }
00286    else if ((m_iDecCount ++ < 5) && (0 == (++ m_iNAKCount % m_iDecRandom)))
00287    {
00288       // 0.875^5 = 0.51, rate should not be decreased by more than half within a congestion period
00289       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 1.125);
00290       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00291    }
00292 }
00293 
00294 void CUDTCC::onTimeout()
00295 {
00296    if (m_bSlowStart)
00297    {
00298       m_bSlowStart = false;
00299       if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00300          m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00301       else
00302          m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00303    }
00304    else
00305    {
00306       /*
00307       m_dLastDecPeriod = m_dPktSndPeriod;
00308       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 2);
00309       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iLastAck;
00310       */
00311    }
00312 }
